title: House price statistics for small areas
summary: House price statistics for a range of geographies in England and Wales, on a quarterly rolling year basis. The smallest areas covered by the statistics are middle layer super output areas, and the statistics are also available for a range of larger geographies. Statistics are reported for different types of house including newly built and existing stock, all house types combined, detached, semi-detached, terraced houses and flats/maisonettes.
metaDescription: Statistics on house prices for all property sales along with a breakdown of these sales by dwelling type (detached, semi-detached, terraced and flats/maisonettes) and newly built or existing dwellings.
